page.title: 08WOODCRAFT IND. PIVINGTON
page.content: Woodcraft Industries are the smallest firm at Pivington Mill. They make garden furniture such as sheds and picnic tables and any small wooden constructions designed to customers requirements. The main type of wood used is pine from either Sweden or Canada though woods such as cedar and oak are used but are more expensive. Three people are employed here full time and the tools they use are planes and bench saws for preparing the wood and an air compressor provides the power for much of the machinery. Todays price for a garden shed 10ft. by 8ft. and made from pine is Â£319 inclusive.
